com.codename1.rad.controllers

Class FormController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.rad.controllers.Controller
      • com.codename1.rad.controllers.ViewController
        • com.codename1.rad.controllers.FormController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener<ControllerEvent>

    public class FormController
extends ViewController

    A controller for handling application logic related to a Form.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FormController.FormBackEvent
      Event that can be fired by any view to request that the current form go back to the previous form.
      static class  FormController.FormControllerEvent
      Base class for FormController events.

    • Method Detail

      • setView

        public void setView(Form form)

        Sets the form associated with this controller. This will automatically set the back command of the form to call back() on this controller.

        Parameters:
        form -

      • setView

        public void setView(Component cmp)

        Overrides parent setView(). Delegates to #setView(com.codename1.ui.Form if cmp is a form. Throws IllegalArgumentException otherwise.

        Overrides:
        setView in class ViewController
        Parameters:
        cmp -

      • getView

        public Form getView()

        Gets form associated with this controller.

        Overrides:
        getView in class ViewController
        Returns:

      • back

        public void back()

        Goes back to previous form. The previous form is always the parent controller’s form, if the parent controller is a FormController.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(ControllerEvent evt)

        Handles Controller event. This implementation consumes FormController.FormBackEvent events.

        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface ActionListener<ControllerEvent>
        Overrides:
        actionPerformed in class Controller
        Parameters:
        evt -
